_header: Alone as I went up and down / In an abbey
_description: Robert Henryson, ‘The Abbay Walk’ — seven 8-line stanzas, ababbcbc, including the refrain, ‘Obey and thank thy god of all’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Allone as I went vp and dounIn to ane abbay for to
                    se…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…quhilk rasis þe law and humilis þe hieObey and
                    thank þi god of all

Banna.First Lines:
Allone as I went vp and dounin ane abbay was fair to
                    se…
Banna.Last Lines:
…quha heis law hairtis and lawis heObey and thank thy god of
                    all
